dataModel.description: The number of written materials (incl. brochures) taken by participants at an event
dataModel.name: numberOfWrittenMaterials

dataModel.description: The number of unique written materials provided to the public. This could include social media posts, brochures, fliers or emails. Do not double count where multiple copies of the same written material have been distributed to many people.
dataModel.name: numberOfUniqueWrittenMaterials

dataModel.description: The number of individual participants taking materials at an event
dataModel.name: numberOfMaterialRecipients

dataModel.description: The number of individual displays and presentations given at an event
dataModel.name: numberOfDisplays

items.preLabel: No. of Displays at the event:
